$description: Core font size primitives using numeric scale. Rem-based sizes respect user browser font size preferences.

100.$description: Extra small font size (12px). MINIMUM readable size.

200.$description: Small font size (14px). Use for: secondary text, table content.

300.$description: Medium font size (16px). DEFAULT body text size.

400.$description: Large font size (18px). Use for: lead paragraphs.

500.$description: Extra large font size (20px). Use for: small headings.

600.$description: 2X large font size (22px). Use for: medium headings (h4).

700.$description: 3X large font size (26px). Use for: prominent headings (h3).

800.$description: 4X large font size (34px). Use for: major headings (h1-h2).

900.$description: 5X large font size (40px). Use for: hero display text.
